name: T2 Export
author: ThemeTon

sections.description:
This is ThemeTon and we sell premium themes on ThemeForest.net. Most of the time people want to get specific home page and few pages on their site instead of full demo site content.
But it’s hard to separate requested page content with attachement for them everytime and I’ve developed this simple plugin.

Main functionality depends on WP core function and added slight modification. You can export a page or multiple pages to a xml file as regular WordPress export function.
Then you can import your exported file for WP importer plugin.

Credits

  • WordPress
  • jQuery select2 plugin by Igor Vaynberg
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload t2export folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Finally export your content through the ‘T2 Export’ menu in WordPress dashboard

short_description: If you need to export specific pages with attachement, you should use this plugin.
